NanoVMs | Kernel Engineer, Sales Engineer, many more | SF, CA | Onsite | Full Time

We're building out unikernel based infrastructure. You don't have to read Hotcloud or OSDI papers to know that this is what the future of software infrastructure is. The unikernel ecosystem is growing lightning fast by the day and we want you to join in for the fun. We are a small team looking to upgrade the world's software infrastructure. When tech giants are getting owned and subsequently sued every single day and Jeff Bezos is the worlds richest person you know we have some serious infrastructure problems at play. We want you to help us fix these and prepare us all for the future. We simply can't carry on like we have for the past 50 years.

We're the brand new systems engineering company on the block.

We're hiring across the board but in particular are looking for more:

* Kernel Engineer: Looking for engineers that like to bleed performance and security and those with strong c/asm skills, operating system fundamentals a must along with comp. sci fundamentals - bonus points if you like to quote Intel manuals in PRs ;)

* Sales Engineer

Please check out the careers page and see if there is a fit: https://nanovms.breezy.hr/
